title: 55 Year Old White Man
itunes:title: 55 Year Old White Man
description:
Good morning Steve and the show family I have a situation that needs an immediate resolution. I'm a 38 year old African-American woman who is a single parent. I'm independent hardworking attractive and successful. My problem is this. I'm not a 55 year old white man at the airport. We exchange business cards and began a friendship. I started out really liking him but now I am not sure if I like him or the things he does for me.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
